name: secret-potion
effect: Required to cure the Psyducks blocking Route 210 of their chronic headaches.
short_effect: Used to heal the Ampharos at the top of Olivine Lighthouse.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.
